abstract: Microsoft said it would abide by a European privacy panel’s request to reduce the length of time it kept records of Web searches if its rivals, Yahoo and Google, did the same.
snippet: Microsoft said it would abide by a European privacy panel’s request to reduce the length of time it kept records of Web searches if its rivals, Yahoo and Google, did the same.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN  Microsoft offered Monday to abide by a European privacy panel’s request that it reduce the length of time it kept records of Web searches if its rivals, Yahoo and Google, did the same.

headline.main: Microsoft Offers to Reduce Search Data in Europe
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Offers to Reduce Search Data in Europe
